description: Main entry point and app scaffold for the Flutter-based Finance Tracker app, including routing, theming, and main navigation setup.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application managing theme and initial route based on authentication state.

classes.name: MainNavigation
classes.description: Main bottom navigation bar managing different primary screens of the app.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point initializing the app with a ProviderScope for state management.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp, configuring MaterialApp with theme and initial route based on auth state.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates state object for MainNavigation widget.

methods.name: _onItemTapped
methods.description: Handles navigation bar tap events, updating selected index.
